mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book ( book.title, book.isbn, book.price, book.publicationDate, book.introduction, book.size, book.author, book.press) VALUES ( #{book.title}, #{book.isbn}, #{book.price}, #{book.publicationDate}, #{book.introduction}, #{book.size}, #{book.author}, #{book.press});
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET book.author = #{book.author}, book.title = #{book.title}, book.price = #{book.price}, book.publicationDate = #{book.publicationDate}, book.introduction = #{book.introduction}, book.size = #{book.size}, book.press = #{book.press} WHERE isbn = #{book.isbn};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book WHERE book.author LIKE CONCAT('%',#{author},'%') LIMIT 20;
